title: Fake-News-Detection
description: Developed a machine learning model for fake news detection using Random Forest and XGBoost, achieving 76% accuracy and enhancing reliability through effective data preprocessing.

title: Clothing-Cart
description: Thara is a modern and responsive e-commerce platform for the fashion industry, providing a seamless shopping experience. Built with React, this project highlights my front-end development and UI design skills.

title: Google-Clone
description: This project is a functional clone of the Google Search Engine, demonstrating my skills in front-end development and API integration using React and Google APIs.
